com.philips.cdp.dicommclient.discovery

Class DiscoveryManager<T extends Appliance>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.philips.cdp.dicommclient.discovery.DiscoveryManager<T>

  • public class DiscoveryManager<T extends Appliance>
extends Object
    Discovery of the appliances is managed by Discovery Manager. It is the main interface to the User Interface. The output of Discovery Manager is the list of DICommAppliances which is further handled by User Interface and Appliance Manager. In order to build this list, the Discovery Manager makes use of input from SSDP, a pairing database and network changes.
